A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a lot of fun. From the perspective of someone who likes but doesn't love Star Wars\, this is about as good as these movies get. The pacing was unconventional but that worked in its favor- after a franchise full of typical \"build up to life-or-death finale where the good guys win through sheer dumb luck\,\" it was refreshing to have failed attempts\, non-starter plants and mistakes with consequences for both the good and bad guys.
